thread.title: Minette
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by Minette

author: Minette
title: Minette
text: I needed to order several mats, all with multiple openings, and this requires working one on one with customer service. They were absolutely fantastic! They understood exactly what I was trying to do, and were creative in their designs. I've already done all of my framing, and it looks like I took it all to a professional framer and paid many hundreds of dollars, when really, it's just standard store-bought frames, and the magic of Matboard & More!
